Title: Something Foul is Afoot
Description:
You notice a stronger-than-usual smell permeating from ahead. Your stomach lurches as the thick smell fills your nostrils.
 
You recognize this smell, it's saurok. Rotting, discarded saurok flesh infused with the foul waste of the sewer.
ObjectivesText: Seek and destroy Flesh'rok the Diseased.
PortraitGiverText: Flesh'rok gurgles and moans in the distance.
